Inc.","details":"Prevents transfers that would leave sender with a balance below the minimum,      unless they are transferring their entire balance (full exit).      Use cases:      - Fund minimum investment requirements (e.g., $100K minimum)      - Accredited investor thresholds      - Preventing dust positions      - Regulatory minimum holdings      Rules:      - If sender's balance after transfer < minimum AND > 0, transfer blocked      - Full exits (balance after = 0) are always allowed      - Mints and burns bypass this check      - Holders with auto-exempt roles (e.g., admin/GP) bypass this check      - Default minimum is 0 (no restriction)","kind":"dev","methods":{"getAutoExemptRoles(address)":{"params":{"token":"Token address"},"returns":{"_0":"Role bitmask where bit N = role N is auto-exempt"}},"getMinimumBalance(address)":{"params":{"token":"Token address"},"returns":{"_0":"Minimum balance required"}},"isHolderExempt(address,address)":{"params":{"holder":"Holder address","token":"Token address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if exempt"}},"isRoleAutoExempt(address,uint8)":{"params":{"role":"Role number to check","token":"Token address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if role is auto-exempt"}},"previewTransfer(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"from":"Sender address","quantity":"Amount to transfer","token":"Token address"},"returns":{"allowed":"Whether transfer would be allowed","balanceAfter":"Balance after transfer","minimum":"Minimum required"}},"setAutoExemptRole(address,uint8,bool)":{"details":"Role 0 (admin) is commonly used for GPs/managers who should be exempt      For batch updates, use batched UserOperations instead of a batch function","params":{"exempt":"Whether holders with this role are exempt","role":"Role number (0 = DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE, etc.)","token":"Token address"}},"setExemption(address,address,bool)":{"params":{"exempt":"Whether holder is exempt from minimum","holder":"Address to exempt/unexempt","token":"Token address"}},"setMinimumBalance(address,uint256)":{"params":{"minimum":"Minimum balance required (0 = no minimum)","token":"Token address"}},"validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Rules:      - Mints (from == 0): Always allowed      - Burns (to == 0): Always allowed      - If sender is explicitly exempt: Always allowed      - If sender has an auto-exempt role: Always allowed      - If no minimum set (== 0): Always allowed      - If balance after transfer == 0 (full exit): Allowed      - If balance after transfer >= minimum: Allowed      - Otherwise: Blocked      Note: lotId parameter is unused - this is a balance-level check","params":{"from":"Sender address","quantity":"Amount being transferred","to":"Recipient address (unused but required by interface)"},"returns":{"_0":"True if transfer is allowed"}}},"stateVariables":{"autoExemptRoles":{"details":"Holders with any of these roles on the token are auto-exempt (e.g., GP, admin)"},"isExempt":{"details":"Allows specific addresses to hold less than minimum (e.g., treasury, liquidity pools)"}},"title":"MinimumBalanceModule","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"autoExemptRoles(address)":{"notice":"Auto-exempt roles: token => role ":{"packages/tokens/interfaces/compliance/IComplianceModule.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3532d7ba2480af7c2df522c78f1536ebd71d5635ebf9c630e3928bcb6b33e892","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://b7465bbf168220682a4da7dc54f6cb930ce404063cff4caaa994534dfb573ae6","dweb:/ipfs/QmaGEsme7qKjQPEsgAMws7mh9dRcXv1fFy9PG5W64CaXdu"]},"packages/tokens/src/compliance/modules/MinimumBalanceModule.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3c3c1822d9be3674a18bc870cf858122a237fc0cefd4c787628588085ba17688","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://6b0e3b6d65b93e734551e9214c41997b7e7868d67cdf2d47e16f6505d1491802","dweb:/ipfs/QmQtu89ZAg3VUzsHUhWvB2DWVLEkcW6hEYsM8spvRTHXyq"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: Role bitmask where bit N = role N is auto-exempt

setAutoExemptRole(address,uint8,bool).details: Role 0 (admin) is commonly used for GPs/managers who should be exempt      For batch updates, use batched UserOperations instead of a batch function

params.exempt: Whether holders with this role are exempt
Whether holder is exempt from minimum

validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32.details: Rules:      - Mints (from == 0): Always allowed      - Burns (to == 0): Always allowed      - If sender is explicitly exempt: Always allowed      - If sender has an auto-exempt role: Always allowed      - If no minimum set (== 0): Always allowed      - If balance after transfer == 0 (full exit): Allowed      - If balance after transfer >= minimum: Allowed      - Otherwise: Blocked      Note: lotId parameter is unused - this is a balance-level check

params.to: Recipient address (unused but required by interface)

getAutoExemptRoles(address).notice: Get auto-exempt roles bitmask for a token

getMinimumBalance(address).notice: Get minimum balance for a token

isHolderExempt(address,address).notice: Check if a holder is exempt from minimum balance

isRoleAutoExempt(address,uint8).notice: Check if a specific role is auto-exempt for a token

previewTransfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Preview if a transfer would be allowed

processTransfer(address,address,bytes32,.notice: Process transfer (no state updates needed for this module)

setAutoExemptRole(address,uint8,bool).notice: Set whether holders with a specific role are auto-exempt

setExemption(address,address,bool).notice: Set exemption for a specific holder

setMinimumBalance(address,uint256).notice: Set minimum balance for a token

tokenOwner(address).notice: Tracks which address owns each token's configuration

validateTransfer(address,address,bytes32.notice: Validate if transfer maintains minimum balance requirement
